attributes.action: Do not commit the United Kingdom to take part in the Economic Forum Global Reset
attributes.additional_details: The Great Reset is about maintaining and empowering a corporate extraction machine, the private ownership of life and not in the best interests of the United Kingdom or the World.
attributes.background: Accept the petition that British people do not want the United Kingdom to take part in the Economic Forums Global Reset. To stop forthwith the United Kingdom taking part and any commitment to the Economic Forum Global Reset.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The UK Government and Parliament haven't adopted 'the Great Reset'. It's not clear from your petition what specific things you would like Government to commit not to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
